DataElement.preferredName: Tooth Localized Sensitivity Assessment Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes/no indicator related to assessment of the ability to respond to physical stimuli or to register small physical amounts or differences in localized area of tooth.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to assessment of the ability to respond to physical stimuli or to register small physical amounts or differences in localized area of tooth.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: is an organ, the organ parts of which primarily consist of dentine and dental enamel; together with other teeth it constitutes a subdivision of the facial skeleton. Example(s): incisor, molar.

Concepts.definition: The hard bonelike structures in the jaws of vertebrates; primarily used for eating.

Property.preferredDefinition: To a restricted area (of the body).:Sensitivity; the ability to respond to physical stimuli or to register small physical amounts or differences.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: To a restricted area (of the body).
The ability to respond to physical stimuli or to register small physical amounts or differences.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: PEARL CRF:Practitioners Engaged in Applied Research and Learning Network Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016
